co.aurasphere.assignables.policy

Interface AssignmentPolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssignIfNotAlreadyThereAssigmentPolicy, CleanAssignmentPolicy, DoAfterDelayAssignmentPolicy, ExplosiveAssignmentPolicy, JavaLegacyAssignmentPolicy, LoggingAssignmentPolicy, MD5AssignmentPolicy, NopeAssignmentPolicy, OptionalAssignmentPolicy, PerformanceMonitorAssignmentPolicy, SafeAssignmentPolicy, StochasticAssignmentPolicy, UnsupportedAssignmentPolicy

    public interface AssignmentPolicy
    Interface that defines how a value should be put into a variable.
    Author:
    Donato Rimenti

      • assign

        void assign(Object value,
            Assignable variable)
        Method that defines how a value should be put into a variable.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to put into the variable.
        variable - the variable where to put the value.
